name: Meitantei Conan: Norowareta K?ro
description:
Meitantei Conan: Norowareta Kouro (?????? ??????) is a murder mystery adventure game based on Detective Conan manga and anime. Once again, Kudou Shinichi, a teenager with a great deduction skills who got shrank to a body of a 5-year old and now goes by the name of Conan Edogawa, finds himself in the middle of a mystery as boards the cruise liner as one of a participants on a mystery trip.

The game uses bird's eye camera while Conan is moving and investigating areas of interest, and switches to first-person visual novel style gameplay during dialogues or sometimes just uses dialogue window with character portraits over the gameplay scene. As in earlier games in the series, Conan obtains keywords that will help him in his investigation through people's testimonies and item clues.
